metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29600 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In AWStats through 7.7, cgi-bin/awstats.pl?config= accepts an absolute pathname, even though it was intended to only read a file in the /etc/awstats/awstats.conf format. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-1000501.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fix is incomplete, see CVE-2020-35176

criterions.comment: awstats: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
